attributes.action: Kevin Sinfield should be Knighted for his fund raising accomplishments for MND.
attributes.additional_details: Kevin Sinfield is a role model for millions of people. He has raised more than 10 million pounds for MND and should be rewarded for his achievements. Other have been Knighted for failure and ruining the capital. Starmer should do the right thing and award him a Knighthood. Just one do the right thing Starmer !!
attributes.background: The PM should award a Knighthood for Kevin Sinfield.

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
